name: Peasant Kingdom
description:
Description:

Peasant Kingdom is a PVP survival game where players can build castles, craft items, fight other players for resources, besiege and defend castles.


Ranged combat:



Take part in exciting battles with a wide variety of throwing weapons. Each of these weapons has its own unique characteristics and involves a specific playstyle.


Melee combat:



Melee combat is represented by full control over the direction of the weapon's strike and the position of the shield. To block an enemy strike, you need to cover exactly the area in which the strike is directed.


Building:



Design your castles in such a way that it is more difficult for other players to besiege them. The possibilities of the game offer a lot of scope for various tricky castle designs.


Placeables:



Build structures that will help you craft items, cook food, process resources and much more.

Contact email: lucky18.inc@gmail.com
